j.servers.tipc¶

  • path: /grid/tipc/TipcFactory.py

getClient¶

  • params: servaddr,category,org,user,passwd,ssl,roles

getServer¶

  • params: servaddr,sslorg,ssluser,sslkeyvaluestor
  • path:/grid/tipc/TipcFactory.py (line:6)

HOW TO USE: daemon=j.servers.tornado.getServer(port=4444)

class MyCommands(): def __init__(self,daemon): self.daemon=daemon

def pingcmd(self,session=session): return “pong”

def echo(self,msg=””,session=session): return msg

daemon.addCMDsInterface(MyCommands,category=”optional”) #pass as class not as object !!! chose category if only 1 then can leave “”

daemon.start()
